remarks: The inner product operation as a function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2015.)
statement:
ipffval.1 $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipffval.2 $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
ipffval.3 $e |- .x. = ( .if ` W ) $.
ipffval $p |- .x. = ( x e. V , y e. V |-> ( x ., y ) ) $.
$d ., x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d W x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
